title: Virtual Assistant for Amazon Online Arbitrage
job_overview:
Looking for a talented VA with experience in working with US-Based Amazon Online Arbitrage sourcing.  We are seeking a long-term employee who is good at sourcing and thinking outside of the box. 

Your primary role will be source products.

Requirements:
*Using Google Sheets
*Keepa (Required)
*Seller AMP SAS (Preferred)
*US Online Arbitrage sourcing Knowledge
*Knowledge of Sale Rank

You must have a good and stable internet connection

Benefits:
*Flexible work schedule. It does not matter when you do the work as long as the work gets done
*Bi-Weekly Payment
*Flexible Time-Off if requested

You will need to pass this before your employment can begin. If you feel you are right for the job, please put the following in your response:

1. Please detail your past experience with Keepa, Scan Profit and OA product sourcing
2. Discuss your favorite category for sourcing products and why
3. Record a video telling ne why you believe you are a good fit for the job

** There will be a 30 day trial period. You will be given simple products sourcing tasks to complete.  If you have completed those successfully, we will discuss ongoing employment after 30 days. 

I look forward to hearing from you soon
